posts.post_content:
I just did an inventory of my 1910 Obaks, and found that I have 23 of the 35 slogans that appear on the card backs. Here are the ones I need:

Cigarettes of Quality
Delicate Aromatic
Everyone Satisfies
For Exacting Smokers
Immensely Popular
Instantly Popular
Just Right
Mais Paper Wrapper
Marvelous Blend
Perfect Flavor
Surpass Imagination
The Story In The Smoking

If anybody out there happens to have a spare 1910 Obak with one of these slogans that you're willing to sell, I'd be mighty pleased if you could let me know.

Edited to add that I generally prefer raw cards, since all of my other Obaks are raw, but I would be open to graded cards.
